name: Ruins of Naram (Demo)
description:
A 3D Hack & Slash game that takes place in the world of Charsim. The game is currently in development by one person.

Story

The game follows the story of Kenon, a strong warrior from the royal guards of Shan, entering the ancient ruins of Naram, a forsaken place where the daughter of the lord of Shan has been taken hostage by bandits.

Gameplay

Keyboard controls:

Mouse: Move camera
Left click: Basic Attack
Mouse Middle: Focus
W, A, S & D keys: Move player
Space: Jump
F: Action Button
E: Block
Ctrl: Dodge
Tab: Power
Esc: Pause

Supports Xbox & PS4 controllers.
